long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Nuts and Bolts Puzzle : Color Sort - A Fun and Challenging Color Sorting Puzzle Game!

Welcome, mechanical enthusiasts and color sorting aficionados, to the innovative world of Nuts and Bolts: Color Sort! In this unique game, not only will you be tasked with unscrewing nuts and bolts, but you'll also face the exciting challenge of sorting them by color. Are you ready to put your dexterity and color recognition skills to the test in this engaging and entertaining sorting adventure?

Game Features:

Unscrew and Sort: Engage in the hands-on experience of unscrewing nuts and bolts from various objects, and then dive into the thrilling task of sorting them by their distinct colors. Sharpen your focus and organization skills as you tackle the dual challenge of dismantling and categorizing.
 
Extension Button Menu
*Play more games and explore exciting themes on the page menu buttons.
